title: LOL Garena PH
body: is there any way i can play garena league of legends (philippines) here in NA (canada) by downloading some kind of bypass proxy or like VPN access .?

replies.body:
You may be able to, but I cannot assist you in troubleshooting issues connecting to Garena's servers since they're solely operated and [supported by Garena.](https://lol.garena.ph/) I recommend hitting them up if you require any further assistance with connecting to their servers.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Sure if you don't mind 250ms ping.
